__e: You had Patrick arrested, you brought him in for interrogation, but so far you've got nothing 'cause he'll only talk to me?
If you had something on me, we'd be in the box right now, but you got nothin'!
Yeah, we brought him in for questioning, but he lawyered up quick and told us zip.
Like he's a-a cop interrogating me or something.
Due to his recent head injuries, he can't participate in an interview longer than 30 minutes.
I think that you've understood, after the interrogatory of today.
Every interrogation is a struggle between two parties for control... but when forward progress depends on you giving up this control... you have to be careful.
If this inquisition is over, I got work to do.
If you don't have anything more conclusive...
